system.description:
At 15th level, your deep study of the elements allows you to suddenly surge ahead in power and understanding, far exceeding your normal limits. Choose one of the following spells associated with one of your elemental affinities. You may cast this spell once per long rest without spending spell points. (With the Narrator’s approval, you may select a different 6th-level spell appropriate to your element.)

Air. @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.ul2dm9mm2d9p7v5t]{Reap the Whirlwind}

Earth. @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.7tdh92wr0hnymgvr]{Ravaging Roots}

Fire. @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.ppnrlrscd3djkydd]{Sunbeam}

Water. @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.oxrnnxd894sfb996]{Freezing Sphere}
